text: Democratic Movement (, MD) was a political party in San Marino. ==History== The party contested national elections for the first time in 1993,Dieter Nohlen & Philip Stöver (2010) Elections in Europe: A data handbook, p1682 when it received 5.3% of the vote, winning two of the 60 seats in the Grand and General Council. In the 1998 elections it was succeeded by the Ideas in Motion party.Tom Lansford (2015) Political Handbook of the World 2015, CQ Press ==References== Category:Defunct political parties in San Marino Category:Political parties with year of establishment missing Category:Political parties with year of disestablishment missing
title: Democratic Movement (San Marino)
